testcase.name: DBA.TR06
testcase.description: DBA.TR06: gsd:ReportingPeriodEndDate must specify the same date as period endDate in the context of gsd:IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: ReportingPeriodEndDate value does not match the PeriodEnd value in the context of IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity
